Text: 2008 Fiesta Bowl:  It was part of the 2007–2008 Bowl Championship Series (BCS) of the 2007 NCAA Division I FBS football season.

Text: 2008 Fiesta Bowl: Played annually since 1971, first at Sun Devil Stadium on the campus of Arizona State University in Tempe, Arizona through 2006, the game was played at 8 p.m. EST on January 2, 2008, at the University of Phoenix Stadium in Glendale, Arizona.
